body:
That hatred is just the anger of being silenced and misrepresented by the loud left. It's the frustration of reddit's censorship that caused it, followed up by censorship in reality. An online forum bled into real life, people actually go around spouting that echo chamber shit. I can spot a redditor at work a mile off, they act like a mouth piece for mainstream news. Disagree with them, and out come the emotions, usually anger and hatred. From what I witnessed, the hate of Voat was fed by the hatred of the "tolerant" left. 

I tend to focus more on education of stifled facts. This doesn't go over well with the programmed minds of plebbit.
body_html:
That hatred is just the anger of being silenced and misrepresented by the loud left. It's the frustration of reddit's censorship that caused it, followed up by censorship in reality. An online forum bled into real life, people actually go around spouting that echo chamber shit. I can spot a redditor at work a mile off, they act like a mouth piece for mainstream news. Disagree with them, and out come the emotions, usually anger and hatred. From what I witnessed, the hate of Voat was fed by the hatred of the "tolerant" left.

I tend to focus more on education of stifled facts. This doesn't go over well with the programmed minds of plebbit.

body: Hey, welcome to ruqqus! The admins are listed [here](https://ruqqus.com/help/admins), and most of the time, they're willing to talk with the community. I hope you enjoy it here. I recommend checking out +Ruqqus, +BetaFeedback, +changelog, and +RuqqusAdmin for any discussion or news about the site itself.

author.bio: Former Hells Angel, ex-carny, briefly a merc, and now retired....but still raising enough hell to get booted from Reddit, and banned from Facebook without ever joining.
author.bio_html: Former Hells Angel, ex-carny, briefly a merc, and now retired....but still raising enough hell to get booted from Reddit, and banned from Facebook without ever joining.

body: Welcome, and congrats on having the balls or backbone to flip Reddit the birdie. I informed their mods they had violated my TOP (Terms Of Patronage) and presented my FU over a year ago. No regrets. Ruqqus is much like Reddit used to be, before the leftist dirtbags reached a tipping point, and usurped the mods and admin.
